duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell software maintenance agreements (SMA’s) to enable customer success with Enterprise Data Systems.
Engage in outbound and inbound telephone sales activities to directly reach end-users across the Americas territory.
Work with software product specialists to acquire new customers and retain existing ones.
Manage own sales funnel and actively seek out business opportunities via Marcom or other creative initiatives.
Communicate deals, issues, and opportunities with relevant specialists.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree or University Degree or equivalent needed. Degree in technical field of Chemistry, Biology preferred. No prior experience required; may have up to 2 years of meaningful experience.
